lyrics

The Begin Again soundtrack is rich and vibrant, full of the ambiance of the city, an atmospheric experience. The soundtrack succeeds in the backdrop of a film and also as an album in itself. The songs span the spectrum of catchy to soulful and the lyrics wind and unwind with the melodies. Every lyric on the album merits time in the spotlight, though a few dazzle above the others. These are some of the best, uncovered lyrical hidden gems in a few select favorite songs from the Begin Again soundtrack album:

are we all
lost stars
trying to light
up the dark

lost stars

(adam levine / full lyrics)

  • youth is wasted on the young
  • speck of dust within the galaxy
  • we're dancing on our tears
  • caught up in dreams and fantasies
  • cupid's demanding back his arrow

just tell
me if you
wanna
go home

tell me if you
wanna go home

(keira knightley / full lyrics)

  • you don't have to kill so kind

is coming
up roses
